subtitle: ={{ $parameter["operation"] + ": " + $parameter["resource"] }}
description: Scrape and control any site with Airtop

options.name: Create Session
options.description: Create an Airtop browser session

options.name: Save Profile on Termination
options.description: Save in a profile changes made in your browsing session such as cookies and local storage
options.action: Save a profile on session termination

options.name: Terminate Session
options.description: Terminate a session

properties.name: profileName
properties.description: The name of the Airtop profile to load or create

properties.name: saveProfileOnTermination
properties.description: Whether to automatically save the Airtop profile for this session upon termination

properties.name: timeoutMinutes
properties.description: Minutes to wait before the session is terminated due to inactivity

properties.name: proxy
properties.description: Choose how to configure the proxy for this session

options.name: None
options.description: No proxy will be used

options.name: Integrated
options.description: Use Airtop-provided proxy

options.name: Proxy URL
options.description: Use a proxy URL to configure the proxy

properties.name: proxyConfig
properties.description: The Airtop-provided configuration to use for the proxy

options.name: country
options.description: The country to use for the proxy. Not all countries are guaranteed to provide a proxy. Learn more here.

options.name: Saint Helena, Ascension and Tristan Da Cunha
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands
United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland
sticky
options.description: Whether to try to maintain the same IP address for the duration of the session. Airtop can guarantee that the same IP address will be available for up to a maximum of 30 minutes.

properties.name: proxyUrl
properties.description: The URL of the proxy to use

options.name: solveCaptcha
options.description: Whether to automatically solve captcha challenges

options.name: extensionIds
options.description: Comma-separated extension IDs from the Google Web Store to be loaded into the session. Learn more here.

properties.displayName: Note: This operation is not needed if you enabled 'Save Profile' in the 'Create Session' operation
properties.name: notice
properties.default: This operation will save the profile on session termination

properties.name: sessionId
properties.description: The ID of the Session to use

properties.name: profileName
properties.description: The name of the Profile to save
properties.hint: Name of the profile you want to save. Must consist only of alphanumeric characters and hyphens "-"

properties.name: sessionId
properties.description: The ID of the Session to use

options.name: Create a New Browser Window
options.description: Create a new browser window inside a session. Can load a URL when created.

options.name: Load URL
options.description: Load a URL in an existing window

options.name: Take Screenshot
options.description: Take a screenshot of the current window

options.name: Close Window
options.description: Close a window inside a session

properties.name: sessionId
properties.description: The ID of the Session to use

properties.name: windowId
properties.description: The ID of the Window to use

properties.name: url
properties.description: Initial URL to load in the window. Defaults to https://www.google.com.

properties.name: getLiveView
properties.description: Whether to get the URL of the window's Live View

properties.name: includeNavigationBar
properties.description: Whether to include the navigation bar in the Live View. When enabled, the navigation bar will be visible allowing you to navigate between pages.

properties.name: screenResolution
properties.description: The screen resolution of the Live View. Setting a resolution will force the window to open at that specific size.

properties.name: disableResize
properties.description: Whether to disable the window from being resized in the Live View

options.name: waitUntil
options.description: Wait until the specified loading event occurs

options.name: Load
options.description: Wait until the page dom and its assets have loaded

options.name: DOM Content Loaded
options.description: Wait until the page DOM has loaded

options.name: Complete
options.description: Wait until all iframes in the page have loaded

options.name: No Wait
options.description: Do not wait for any loading event and it will return immediately

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to load in the window

options.name: waitUntil
options.description: Wait until the specified loading event occurs. Defaults to 'Fully Loaded'.

options.name: Complete
options.description: Wait until the page and all it's iframes have loaded it's dom and assets

options.name: DOM Only Loaded
options.description: Wait until the dom has loaded

options.name: Fully Loaded
options.description: Wait until the page dom and it's assets have loaded

options.name: No Wait
options.description: Do not wait for any loading event and will return immediately

properties.description: Whether to output the image as a binary file instead of a base64 encoded string
properties.name: outputImageAsBinary

options.name: Delete
options.description: Delete an uploaded file

options.name: Get
options.description: Get a details of an uploaded file

options.name: Get Many
options.description: Get details of multiple uploaded files

options.name: Load
options.description: Load a file into a session

options.name: Upload
options.description: Upload a file into a session

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: ID of the file to delete

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: ID of the file to retrieve

properties.name: outputBinaryFile
properties.description: Whether to output the file in binary format if the file is ready for download

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: sessionIds
properties.description: Comma-separated list of Session IDs to filter files by. When empty, all files from all sessions will be returned.

properties.name: outputSingleItem
properties.description: Whether to output one item containing all files or output each file as a separate item

properties.name: sessionId
properties.description: The session ID to load the file into

properties.name: windowId
properties.description: The window ID to trigger the file input in

properties.name: fileId
properties.description: ID of the file to load into the session

properties.name: elementDescription
properties.description: Optional description of the file input to interact with
properties.placeholder: e.g. the file upload selection box

properties.name: sessionId
properties.description: The session ID to load the file into

properties.name: windowId
properties.description: The window ID to trigger the file input in

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: Name for the file to upload. For a session, all files loaded should have unique names.

properties.name: fileType
properties.description: Choose the type of file to upload. Defaults to 'Customer Upload'.

properties.name: source
properties.description: Source of the file to upload

properties.name: binaryPropertyName
properties.description: Name of the binary property containing the file data

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL from where to fetch the file to upload

properties.name: triggerFileInputParameter
properties.description: Whether to automatically trigger the file input dialog in the current window. If disabled, the file will only be uploaded to the session without opening the file input dialog.

properties.name: elementDescription
properties.description: Optional description of the file input to interact with
properties.placeholder: e.g. the file upload selection box

options.name: Query Page
options.description: Query a page to extract data or ask a question given the data on the page

options.name: Query Page with Pagination
options.description: Extract content from paginated or dynamically loaded pages

options.name: Smart Scrape
options.description: Scrape a page and return the data as markdown

properties.name: sessionMode
properties.description: Choose between creating a new session or using an existing one

options.name: Automatically Create Session
options.description: Automatically create a new session and window for this operation

options.name: Use Existing Session
options.description: Use an existing session and window for this operation

properties.name: sessionId
properties.description: The ID of the Session to use

properties.name: windowId
properties.description: The ID of the Window to use

properties.name: url
properties.description: URL to load in the window

properties.name: profileName
properties.description: The name of the Airtop profile to load or create

properties.name: autoTerminateSession
properties.description: Whether to terminate the session after the operation is complete. When disabled, you must manually terminate the session. By default, idle sessions timeout after 10 minutes

properties.name: prompt
properties.description: The prompt to extract data from the pages
properties.placeholder: e.g. Extract all the product names and prices

options.name: outputSchema
options.description: JSON schema defining the structure of the output
options.hint: If you want to force your output to be JSON, provide a valid JSON schema describing the output. You can generate one automatically in the Airtop API Playground.

options.name: parseJsonOutput
options.description: Whether to parse the model's response to JSON in the output. Requires the 'JSON Output Schema' parameter to be set.

options.name: interactionMode
options.description: The strategy for interacting with the page

options.name: Auto
options.description: Automatically choose the most cost-effective mode

options.name: Accurate
options.description: Prioritize accuracy over cost

options.name: Cost Efficient
options.description: Minimize costs while ensuring effectiveness

options.name: paginationMode
options.description: The pagination approach to use

options.name: Auto
options.description: Look for pagination links first, then try infinite scrolling

options.name: Paginated
options.description: Only use pagination links

options.name: Infinite Scroll
options.description: Scroll the page to load more content

properties.name: prompt
properties.placeholder: e.g. Is there a login form in this page?
properties.description: The prompt to query the page content

options.name: outputSchema
options.description: JSON schema defining the structure of the output
options.hint: If you want to force your output to be JSON, provide a valid JSON schema describing the output. You can generate one automatically in the Airtop API Playground.

options.name: parseJsonOutput
options.description: Whether to parse the model's response to JSON in the output. Requires the 'JSON Output Schema' parameter to be set.

options.name: includeVisualAnalysis
options.description: Whether to analyze the web page visually when fulfilling the request

options.name: Click an Element
options.description: Execute a click on an element given a description

options.name: Fill Form
options.description: Fill a form with the provided information

options.name: Hover on an Element
options.description: Execute a hover action on an element given a description

options.name: Scroll
options.description: Execute a scroll action on the page

options.name: Type
options.description: Execute a Type action on an element given a description

properties.name: sessionId
properties.description: The ID of the Session to use

properties.name: windowId
properties.description: The ID of the Window to use

properties.name: elementDescription
properties.description: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on
properties.placeholder: e.g. the green "save" button at the top of the page

properties.name: formData
properties.description: The information to fill into the form written in natural language

properties.name: elementDescription
properties.description: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on
properties.placeholder: e.g. the rounded user profile image at the top right of the page

properties.name: scrollingMode
properties.description: Choose the mode of scrolling

options.name: Automatic
options.description: Describe with natural language the element to scroll to

options.name: Manual
options.description: Define the direction and amount to scroll by

properties.description: A natural language description of the element to scroll to
properties.name: scrollToElement
properties.placeholder: e.g. the page section titled "Contact Us"

properties.name: scrollToEdge
properties.description: The direction to scroll to. When 'Scroll By' is defined, 'Scroll To Edge' action will be executed first, then 'Scroll By' action.

properties.name: scrollBy
properties.description: The amount to scroll by. When 'Scroll To Edge' is defined, 'Scroll By' action will be executed after 'Scroll To Edge'.

options.name: scrollValues
options.description: The amount in pixels or percentage to scroll by

properties.name: scrollWithin
properties.description: Scroll within an element on the page

properties.name: text
properties.description: The text to type into the browser window

properties.name: pressEnterKey
properties.description: Whether to press the Enter key after typing the text

properties.name: elementDescription
properties.description: A specific description of the element to execute the interaction on
properties.placeholder: e.g. the search box at the top of the page

options.name: visualScope
options.description: Defines the strategy for visual analysis of the current window

options.name: Auto
options.description: Provides the simplest out-of-the-box experience for most web pages

options.name: Viewport
options.description: For analysis of the current browser view only

options.name: Page
options.description: For analysis of the entire page

options.name: Scan
options.description: For a full page analysis on sites that have compatibility issues with 'Page' mode

options.name: waitForNavigation
options.description: The condition to wait for the navigation to complete after an interaction (click, type or hover). Defaults to 'Fully Loaded'.

name: n8n-nodes-base.airtop
